Jaromír Jágr

Full Name: Jaromir Jágr

(Jags, Mario Jr., The Ageless Wonder)

Position: RW •  Shoots: Left

6-3, 230lb (190cm, 104kg)

Born: February 15, 1972 in Kladno, Czechoslovakia cs

Draft: Pittsburgh, 1st round (5th overall), 1990 NHL Entry

Pronunciation: \YAIR-oh-MEER YAH-guhr\

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jaromír Jágr?

Jaromír Jágr is 53 years old.

When was Jaromír Jágr born?

Jaromír Jágr was born on February 15, 1972.

Where was Jaromír Jágr born?

Jaromír Jágr was born in Kladno, Czechoslovakia.

How tall is Jaromír Jágr?

Jaromír Jágr is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much did Jaromír Jágr weigh when playing?

Jaromír Jágr weighed 230 lbs (104 kg) when playing.

Is Jaromír Jágr in the Hockey Hall of Fame?

Jaromír Jágr has not been elected into the Hockey Hall of Fame.

How many goals did Jaromír Jágr have?

Jaromír Jágr had 766 goals over his career.

How many points did Jaromír Jágr have?

Jaromír Jágr had 1,921 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Jaromír Jágr won?

Jaromír Jágr has won 2 Stanley Cups as a player.

When did Jaromír Jágr retire?

Jaromír Jágr last played in 2018.
